1579830.name: RPG Maker MV - Particle Effect Pack for MV
1579830.description:
You want to impress your game players with animations effects? Here you have it with this brand new Particle effects animation pack! Featuring 100 very usable and important effects that your characters can use to bring excitement and bright action to the big screen!

*******************************************
Features:

animations: 100 kinds such as:

・Arrow
・Axe
・Book
・Breath-Darkness / Earth / Fire / Ice / Light /Thunder / Water / Wind
・Claws
・Cross-Claw / Hit / Pierce / Slash
・Darkness
・Earth
・Explosion
・Fire
・Firework
・Flail
・Flowers: Claw / Hit / Pierce / Slash
・HeartMark
・Hit
・Ice
・Light
・Meteorite
・Neutral
・Pierce
・Poison
・Protection
・Reflection
・Rod
・SanskritEffect
・Scythe
・Shield
・Shoot
・Shout
・Slash
・Smokescreen
・Song
・StarClaw
・StarEffect
・Star - Pierce / Hit / Slash
・Thunder
・Water
・Whip
・Wind

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
